author: Staff Reporter
text:
In an effort aimed at wiping out cataract and defective vision, the District Blindness Control Society (DBCS) in association with the district administration will conduct a special eye screening camps from February 12 to February 25.

The dates and venues announced by the District Blind Control Society are; Agasteeswaram – Feb. 12, Sub Health Centre, Myladi; Thiruvattar – Feb. 17, Panchayat Union Primary School, Mudalar; Rajakkamangalam – Feb. 18 – Sub Helath Centre, Pallam; Thovala – Feb. 19 – Government High School, Kumarapuram; Thuckalay – Feb. 24 – Panchayat Union Middle School, Kodiyur and Kurunthancode – Feb. 25 – Panchayat Union Middle School, Chungankadai.

Those who were identified for cataract operation, the operation would be done free of cost and the Intra Ocular Lens provided free of cost by the society.
title: Free eye camps from tomorrow
